sentences.simplifiedText: 尽管他在极度的困难中，他仍然坚定地相信神会帮助他。
sentences.traditionalText: 儘管他在極度的困難中，他仍然堅定地相信神會幫助他。
sentences.pinyin: jǐn guǎn tā zài jí dù de kùn nán zhōng, tā réng rán jiān dìng de xiāng xìn shén huì bāng zhù tā.
sentences.translation: Despite being in extreme difficulty, he remained firm in his belief that God would help him.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他们在山顶建立了一个神的祭坛。
sentences.traditionalText: 他們在山頂建立了一個神的祭壇。
sentences.pinyin: Tāmen zài shāndǐng jiànlìle yīgè shén de jìtán.
sentences.translation: They set up an altar of the deity at the top of the mountain.

sentences.simplifiedText: 在古老的神话传说中，神通常被描绘为拥有超自然力量可以塑造世界的存在。
sentences.traditionalText: 在古老的神話傳說中，神通常被描繪為擁有超自然力量可以塑造世界的存在。
sentences.pinyin: Zài gǔlǎo de shénhuà chuánshuō zhōng, shén tōngcháng bèi miáohuì wéi yǒngyǒu chāo zìrán lìliàng kěyǐ sùzào shìjiè de cúnzài.
sentences.translation: In ancient myths and legends, deities are usually depicted as beings with supernatural powers that can shape the world.

sentences.pinyin: tā yǒu yī zhǒng shén mì de gǎn jué.
sentences.translation: He has a kind of mysterious feeling.

sentences.simplifiedText: 她对美术的热爱和才能表现出一种神圣的精神。
sentences.traditionalText: 她對美術的熱愛和才能表現出一種神聖的精神。
sentences.pinyin: tā duì měi shù de rè ài hé cái néng biǎo xiàn chū yī zhǒng shén shèng de jīng shén.
sentences.translation: Her passion and talent for art shows a kind of sacred spirit.
His eyes are full of mystery.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他的神秘行为使得大家都对他产生了好奇。
sentences.traditionalText: 他的神祕行為使得大家都對他產生了好奇。
sentences.pinyin: tā de shénmì xíngwéi shǐ dé dàjiā dōu duì tā chǎnshēngle hàoqí.
sentences.translation: His mysterious behavior made everyone curious about him.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他在电脑编程方面有神一样的能力。
sentences.traditionalText: 他在電腦編程方面有神一樣的能力。
sentences.pinyin: tā zài diànnǎo biānchéng fāngmiàn yǒu shén yīyàng de nénglì.
sentences.translation: He has godlike abilities in computer programming.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他的健康状况看起来需要进一步的关注.
sentences.traditionalText: 他的健康狀況看起來需要進一步的關注.
sentences.pinyin: Tā de jiànkāng zhuàngkuàng kàn qǐlái xūyào jìnyībù de guānzhù.
sentences.translation: His health condition seems to require further attention.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他的表演技巧真神，观众们都被完全吸引了。
sentences.traditionalText: 他的表演技巧真神，觀眾們都被完全吸引了。
sentences.pinyin: Tā de biǎoyǎn jìqiǎo zhēn shén, guānzhòngmen dōu bèi wánquán xīyǐn le.
sentences.translation: His performance skills are really awesome, and the audience was completely attracted.
